body_html:
A member of the TensorFlow team wrote Bazel's downloader. So we can continue triaging here for now.

It should absolutely not be doing that.

Can you please edit TensorFlow's WORKSPACE file so rules_closure only has a single URL in the URLs list? Then run bazel fetch again. It should now give you the full NullPointerException stack trace. At least I hope. Once you get that, can you please copy and paste it into this bug?

body:
A member of the TensorFlow team wrote Bazel's downloader. So we can continue triaging here for now.

It should absolutely not be doing that.

Can you please edit TensorFlow's WORKSPACE file so rules_closure only has a single URL in the URLs list? Then run bazel fetch again. It should now give you the full NullPointerException stack trace. At least I hope. Once you get that, can you please copy and paste it into this bug?
